name: WellnessGuru
0:
”Alexa, open Wellness Guru”
”Alexa, start Wellness Guru”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wellness guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Wellness Guru helps to screen for potential signs of depression and anxiety by asking a series of questions aimed at assessing your mental wellness. It uses two well-known clinical screening tools known as the PHQ-9 and the GAD-7 in order to make its determination of severity, and provides valuable resources for additional information should it deem necessary.

You can choose to do a "quick" or "full" checkup, which dictates how many questions you will be asked. If this is your first time using the app, you should begin with a full checkup. For optimal results, please try to complete a "quick" checkup every month with Wellness Guru.

This service is not meant as a substitute for medical care, and is intended to serve as an educational tool to help start a conversation about mental health with your doctor. Additional information on anxiety and depression can be found at the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (adaa.org). 

Additional resources:
National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1-800-273-TALK
National Alliance on Mental Illness: www.nami.org
NYC Well Helpline (for anonymous counseling): 1-888-NYC-WELL

Release Notes:

V1.1 (10/14/2017): Added functionality to track user's previous checkup responses and sends a card of resources/responses to user's Alexa app
V1.0: Added functionality to assess for both anxiety and depression
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
